extendedInfo.description: Best of SciTech shows best videos, short descriptions, books on multiple science, engineering and technology topics (e.g., life sciences, biological engineering, physical sciences, medical, astronomy)   Application Features Include1] Displays best scientific information including description, videos and books on any science, engineering and technology topic (e.g., life sciences, biological engineering, physical sciences, medical, astronomy)   2] Create your own reports, write your own short summary, select videos of interest and related books3] Share the reports with friends and get renowned4] Content restricted to high quality descriptions, videos, and books with highest ratings
